articles.description: David Miller never really got a decent run for any franchise he played for in the previous seasons in the IPL with only four overseas players allowed to field in the format.
articles.content: An IPL rule that prevented David Miller to reach his full potential: South African middle-order batter and currently playing for Gujarat Titans, David Miller blamed the four overseas players rule in … [+1904 chars]
